items.name: Monday Kids Eat Free
items.description: After 5pm with the purchase of an adult meal & beverage. Coffee & Tea excluded. *** In-house only.

items.name: Tuesday 2 for 1 Sundaes
items.description: 2 Sundaes for the price of 1 after 5pm with the purchase 2 meals. *** In-house only.

items.name: Sunday Buy 1 Mac Get 1 Half Off
items.description: Sunday after 5pm purchase 1 Mac & Cheese, get the second half off! With the purchase of a beverage. Coffee & Tea excluded. *** In-house only.

items.name: NEW - Burger Buds (after 4 pm)
items.description: Buy 1 Burger at regular price and 2nd 50% off after 4pm with the order of 2 drinks, excluding coffee and tea *Monday - Friday after 4pm*

items.name: NEW - Sundown Special
items.description: Buy 1 Burger Platter get a large beer for $4.99 *Monday - Friday after 4 pm*

items.name: Lunchbox Special (Daily 11am-2pm)
items.description: Forgot your sammie at home? We've got it covered from 11am - 2pm get the soup and sandwich of the day for $14.99 with your choice of bread (white, brown, or *rye) *Rye 0.75 upcharge

items.name: Mac Daddy Food Challenge
items.description: Brought to you by The Wellington Diner, Made famous by the one and only Beard Meets Food *Previous Challenge in Youtube Video* Now includes: Oreo Milkshake, Three Mac Daddy Burgers (two 6oz patties), and a Double Homie Poutine. Complete it in 40 minutes and the meals on us and you join this Legend! Rules: No leaving the table, no splitting, no take home or sharing. Finish it in 40 mins to win.

items.name: NEW - Early Bird Special Mon-Fri until 10 am
items.description: Traditional Breakfast, for the early birds (Monday - Friday Open till 10 am) 2 Eggs, & a choice of 3 slices of bacon, ham, or sausage. Served with seasoned homies & an order of toast. Coffee included. *Substitute your eggs or meat for: Smoked meat, pea meal bacon or 2 mini stoner sausages for an addition $3.99*

categories.name: Eggs Benny
categories.discription: Eggs Benny come POACHED or POACHED HARD at request. Two poached eggs atop an english muffin & smothered in savoury hollandaise. Served alongside house homies or a house salad. *Add sautéed onions to your homies for no additional cost*

items.name: Piggy's Poutine

items.name: Wellington Poutine
items.description: Thinly sliced seasoned steak, mixed peppers, onions, & mushrooms all top a big bowl of fries & St. Albert cheese curds. Add extra curds for $2.49!

items.name: The Pickler
items.description: Our classic poutine topped with chopped deep fried pickles, and a drizzle of Franks Red Hot and ranch. Strangely addictive.

categories.name: Homemade Burger
categories.discription: House-made 6oz patties seasoned with secret diner seasoning. Served with fresh fries, house slaw & sliced dill pickle. Beyond Meat Patty available as a Veggie Patty. *Substitute your bun for gluten free toast for $1 more* Side Upgrades: Onion Rings $4.20, Caesar Salad $4.49, Poutine $4.99, Homie Poutine $4.99, NEW - Side of Mac n Cheese $6.99 Try our specialty mayo: Pesto, Chipotle or Red Pepper for $1.49

items.name: The Hamburger
items.description: Single patty, grilled to perfection. Served with fresh lettuce & tomato. Add bacon or cheddar cheese for $1.49

items.description: House patty topped with cheddar cheese & crisp bacon. Served with fresh lettuce & tomato.

items.name: The Baja
items.description: House patty, cream cheese, jalapenos, Franks Red Hot, bacon, lettuce, tomato.

items.name: The Brie Burger
items.description: House patty, brie cheese, caramelized onions, sauteed mushrooms, lettuce, tomato.

items.description: House patty, 2 jalapeno poppers, cheddar cheese, fresh red peppers, & good old-fashioned onion rings. All dripping in chipotle mayo & Franks Red Hot.

items.name: The Phat Ass Burger
items.description: You came here for a reason: this burger is it. Fresh patty stacked with house pulled-pork, 3 mozzarella sticks, mixed cheese, crisp bacon, & dripping with chipotle mayo.

items.description: House burger patty stuffed between 2 grilled cheese sandwiches. Because why not? Available with bacon for an addition $2

items.name: The Diner Club

items.name: The Rick Rueben
items.description: Stacked, juicy, thin-sliced Montreal style smoked meat with sauerkraut, swiss cheese & 1000 Island dressing on grilled rye. * Served as is, no alterations accepted.

items.name: Hog Wild
items.description: Slow roasted pulled pork smothered in BBQ sauce, caramelized onions, topped with cheddar cheese, homemade slaw & chipotle mayo on a brioche bun. Napkins will be required.

items.name: NEW - Crispy Chicken Caesar Salad Wrap
items.description: Sink your teeth into this hearty wrap, where juicy, crispy fried chicken meets the perfect crunch of a classic Caesar salad. Tossed in creamy Caesar dressing, topped with smoky bacon, and finished with a generous sprinkle of Parmesan cheese, all wrapped snugly in a warm, soft tortilla. A bold twist on a diner favorite—wrapped and ready to savor!

items.name: Buffalo Chicken Wrap
items.description: Crispy chicken tenders tossed in Frank's Red Hot sauce & creamy ranch dressing, paired with Monterey jack cheese, lettuce, & tomato.

items.name: Veggie Wrap
items.description: Guacamole, mixed peppers, onions, carrots, cucumbers, lettuce, feta cheese, & pesto mayo.

items.name: Mean Green Club
items.description: Triple decker with guacamole, cucumber, mixed peppers, onions, lettuce, tomato, shredded carrot, cheddar, and pesto mayo.

items.description: Classic grilled cheese on white bread. Served with fries or apple wedges.

items.name: Fish Sticks
items.description: Classic fish sticks & fries, also available with apple wedges. Served with tartar sauce.
